caption.p: (a) Habitat change (expansion or contraction) of key rare and endangered species in Qinghai Province in the year 2061–2080 under three RCPs (2.6, 4.5 and 8.5); (b) the ability of nature reserves for protecting the key rare and endangered species in Qinghai Province in the year 2061–2080 under three RCPs compared with the current climate conditions
